machine_start_gcode.default_value:
G28 ;Home
G1 Z15.0 F2000 ;Move the platform

command_line_settings.label: Command Line Settings
command_line_settings.description: Settings which are only used if CuraEngine isn't called from the Cura frontend.

center_object.description: Whether to center the object on the middle of the build platform (0,0), instead of using the coordinate system in which the object was saved.
center_object.label: Center object
